channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-14007] Writing to table through MR should fail upfront if table does not exist/is disabled
item.summary: Writing to table through MR should fail upfront if table does not exist/is disabled

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
161	    Admin admin = ConnectionFactory.createConnection(getConf()).getAdmin();

Please use try-with-resources

Does it pass when you run locally ?

Tess passes locally. It passes with the precommit also, but for some reason seems to fail with xml parsing error of the results. Lemme give it another shot, reuploading same patch with bumped up patch number. Lets see.

Mind attaching patch for branch-1 ?

Attaching patch for branch-1.

The only change was I had to use HTable instead of Table in the test to keep the patch similar to branch-2. Lemme know if you want me to use Table and modify runTestOnTable.

Using HTable is fine.

Can you put the HTable instance in the try-with-resource (it implements Closeable) ?
